msbt.message: Don't be shy, . I see you eyeing my dashing, yet seasonally appropriate attire. Bunny Day only comes once a year, so I don't get a lot of opportunities to show off this outfit, . It's a shame, really.

Have you seen the way Zipper struts around, ?Such confidence Such poise Suchmystery.I wonder what folks think when they see me walking around.I assume it's a well-balanced mixture of jealousy and awe.

Heads up, . We can totally eat any Bunny Day eggs that we find or receive. But just because we can doesn't mean we should, .Some of those candies are beautiful enough to be works of art.Eating one would be like taking a bite out of me in a tuxedo!

I know you're on the hunt for eggs, , but don't forget to look up every now and again. Sure, sure, to appreciate the beauty of the sky and how small we are, and all that stuff But more importantly, you never know when you'll see a special Bunny Day balloon waiting to be shot down.

I was taking a stroll on the beach when I saw a bottle as colorful as a Bunny Day egg lying in the surf. I didn't read the note inside, but I can only assume its appearance has something to do with Bunny Day. Either that or the writer collects unusually shaped bottles and throws them into the ocean hoping that their long-lost love will find one and use the shape as a clue to reunite with their beloved! The screenplay practically writes itself, .

I don't want to alarm you, , but I just saw a strange egg floating in the sky. Really? You aren't concerned? Not even a little?Hm. I guess Bunny Day IS predicated on the idea of a rabbit laying eggs. Doesn't get much weirder than that.

If you're looking for something fun to do in celebration of Bunny Day, might I suggest you shake a few trees? Apparently, you just may be rewarded with a beautifully decorated egg, . I'd love to show you one myself, but I've shaken over a hundred trees and I've got nothing to show for it. What if it's a Bunny Day curse?!

So there I was, just enjoying a nice run-of-the-mill fishing trip, when I reeled in somethingunexpected. At first I thought, "I've discovered a new species of fish!" But I wasn't looking at a fish. I was looking at an egg!Of course, I was happy because I love Bunny Day, but then againYou can't achieve worldwide fame with an egg, !
